50086.「わざわざ お越しいただいたということは\n ……もしかして？:
The fact that you came all this way must
mean...

50087.「うむ！\n ついに 魔法の羅針盤が 完成したぞい！: Aye! At last, the Magic Compass is completed!

50088.「これがあれば いかに 迷いの霧といえども\n グランドタイタス号のレンダーシア:
With this compass, not even that thick mist
will stop the Grand Titus from gettin' to
Lendersia.

50089.「今は ただの羅針盤に見えるやもしれんが\n レンダーシアを包む 迷いの霧に突入:
It may look like just a normal compass now,
but just wait until we enter that mist...
Ye'll see what it can do!

50090.「いやん！ 最高だわ！\n グランドタイタス号が また\n レンダーシアに旅立て:
How lovely! Spectacular! Finally, the day
has come where the Grand Titus can make
another voyage to Lendersia!

50091.「ありがとう 賢者ホーローさま<heart>\n あなたって最高！:
Thank you so much, Mister Hollow!
You are truly the best! <heart>

50092.「ああん。こうしちゃいられないわ。\n あたし 船に これを届けにいってくる！\:
A-hem. I'd better get moving and get this
loaded onto the ship! The Grand Titus will
be sailing in no time flat!

50093.「元気でおったか <pc>。\n 相変わらず ビビッドかつ ユニークな\n 顔立:
How're ye faring, <pc>?
Ye' lookin' just as vivid and lively as ever!

50094.「まさか わしのことを 忘れちゃいまいな？\n アストルティアに 知らぬことなし:
You didn't forget me, right? I'm Hollow, the
wandering sage! And there is nothing in
Astoltia I don't know.

50098.「……むっ 言葉足らずだったようじゃな。\n すまん すまん。:
Sorry, <if_woman>lassie<else>laddie<endif>. Looks like I wasn't clear
enough.

50099.「わしが 確認したかったのは\n 前に ランドン山脈で話した 勇者姫のことを\n:
Just checkin' to make sure that you remembered
the Hero Princess I told you about in the
Landon Mountains.

50100.「かつて レンダーシアから放たれた 白い光。\n あの 世界を包んだ 奇跡の光を:
That bright light that shone from Lendersia
that one day. You saw it cover the entire
world, didn't ye?

50101.「あれこそが レンダーシアの大国\n グランゼドーラ王国の 王女が\n 勇者とし:
That light signals the awakening of the
princess of Gran Zedora, the greatest kingdom
in all of Lendersia.

50102.「世界に危機が訪れし時\n 大いなる光とともに 勇者は目覚める……。:
When the world finds itself in danger, a hero
shall awaken in a great light...

50103.「おぬしには 姫君の手助けを頼みたい。\n 勇者姫に会うため 海を渡り\n グラ:
I'd like you to help her any way you can.
Cross the sea to the kingdom of Gran Zedora
so that you can meet her.

50104.「もはや 一刻の猶予もない。\n すぐに 準備を整えて\n グランドタイタス号に:
There's no moment to lose! Get yer bearings
and go on and board the Grand Titus!

50106.「聞いてちょうだい。\n 船も クルーたちも 準備万端！\n 今すぐにでも 出港:
Good news. Both the ship and crew are ready
to leave at moment's notice!

50107.「グランドタイタス号に乗る時は\n 船の前にいる クレインっていう船員に\n タ:
Before you board, make sure to show your
boarding pass to a sailor named Crain. He'll
be near the front of the ship.

50108.「では さらばじゃ。<pc>。\n 運命の線路が交差するとき また会おう！:
Well, safe travels to you, <pc>.
I'll see ya again when the tracks of destiny
cross!

50109.「お兄さーん！\n グランドタイタス号に 乗りたいなら\n 乗船パスあるよっ。最:
Hey, fella'! If ya wanna board the Grand
Titus, do I gotta deal for you! I got one
boarding pass left with yer name on it!

50110.「この船は もう長い間\n 修理のために 運航休止してたんだけど\n それが終わ:
She's been outta commission for awhile now
'cuz of the repairs, but now she's ready to
sail again, fit as a fiddle!

50111.「記念すべき リニューアル後の 初出港だよ！\n 乗りたい人が多すぎて 他では\:
It's the first trip since she reopened, so
a lot of folks'll be wantin' on! Ya can't get
this pass from just anywhere, ya know!

50112.「その超レアな 最後の１枚を\n お兄さんになら 特別に たったの\n １０万ゴ:
But do I got a special deal for you, my good
pal! 100,000 Gold and it's a done deal!
Well? Whaddya say?

50114.「お兄さんの その高貴な顔立ち！\n どこぞの貴族さまと お見受けしたぜ。\n:
I know ya have an appreciation for the finer
things, like this pass! O' course I can tell.
I gots a sixth sense to these kinda things!

50115.「絶対 損させないからよっ！\n ササッと決断して オレから\n 乗船パスを買う:
I'm doin' you a huge favor here! But ya
gotta act fast, I got other people waitin'!
It's truly a great deal. Well?

50117.「いやあ さすがっ！\n 貴族さまは お目が高いっ！！\n へっへっへ…… まい:
Attaboy! You have a good eye! Heh heh heh...
Pleasure doin' business with ya!

50119.「おいっ あんた！\n 今は こんな はしたガネじゃ買えねえんだよ！\n あと１:
Whaddya think you're tryin' to pull here?!
This ain't nearly enough! Come on,
cough up the rest!

50123.「でへへ。こりゃ 本当に失礼しやしたっ。\n あなたさまからは たんまりと\n:
Heh, heh... so sorry! You already paid me in
advance, didn't ya? I totally forgot!

50124.「さあ どうぞ どうぞ。\n こちらが タイタス号乗船パスでございます。\n お:
Here, please take it! Yer shiny new boarding
pass!

50125.「もう 船が出るのですね。: Is the ship all ready to leave?

50126.「はい。お急ぎください。: Yes, sir. Please board right away.

50127.「あ あれっ！？ ……汽笛？\n もう出港の時間になったのか？:
H-huh...?! The ship's horn? It's leavin'
already?

50128.「オレの乗船パスは どこだ！？\n あれ？ あれれっ！？\n ……このカネは な:
Where in blazes is my boarding pass?!
And where did this money come from...?

50129.「お客さま。\n 出港の合図です。船内へ お急ぎください。:
The ship is just about ready to depart.
Please hurry on board.

50130.「グランドタイタス号の船出を ひと目見ようと\n 大勢の人たちが 見送りにきてい:
Many people have come to see off the Grand
Titus. Why not wave to them from the upper
deck?
